com.camerontec.catalys.util.recovery

Interface IRecoverable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITransactionLog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionLogOnFile

    public interface IRecoverable
    Interface defining a class which is recoverable - that is, capable of replaying a set of data to an IRecoveryProcessor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recover(IRecoveryProcessor processor)
      Recover data and pass to an IRecoveryProcessor to process.

    • Method Detail

      • recover

        void recover(IRecoveryProcessor processor)
      throws Exception
        Recover data and pass to an IRecoveryProcessor to process.

        The given processor object will receive all recovered objects in sequence until recovery is complete or until the process throws an exception.

        Any exception that the processor throws will be passed back by this method.

        Parameters:
        processor - processor of recovered objects
        Throws:
        Exception - TBD
